summary: TAKATA RECALL  THE DASH WHERE MY PASSENGER SIDE AIRBAG IS, IS STARTING TO COME APART. I HAVE NOT HEARD FROM FORD IN OVER A YEAR ABOUT THIS RECALL. I AM NOT SURE WHAT WOULD HAPPEN OF SOMEONE PUSHED HARD IN THAT SPOT OF MY DASH. TO ME IT IS A HUGE SAFETY ISSUE AND SHOULD HAVE ALREADY BEEN FIXED. OR THEY SHOULD AT LEAST STAY IN CONTACT WITH PEOPLE ABOUT THIS PROBLEM. I AM VERY DISSATISFIED WITH FORD ON THIS RECALL.
